sections.heading: to 65-2-79 - Repealed.Section 65-2-80 to 65-2-127 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1981, ch. 358, § 49, repealed 65-2-1 to 65-2-79 NMSA 1978, relating to motor carrier regulation, effective April 10, 1981. For present provisions,see65-2A-1 NMSA 1978 et seq.

sections.heading: to 65-2-127 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 2003, ch. 359 § 44, repealed 65-2-80 to 65-2-127 NMSA 1978, the Motor Carrier Act, effective July 1, 2003. For provisions of former sections,seethe 2002 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For present comparable provisions,see65-2A-1 NMSA 1978 et seq.
